text: Svetlin Rusev (; 14 June 1933 â€“ 26 May 2018) was a Bulgarian artist and a collector of art. He was known for the Svetlin Rusev Donative Exhibition, a permanent art exhibition in Pleven, including over 400 works of Bulgarian and foreign artist donated by him.Svetlin Rusev Donative Exhibition ==Death== Rusev died on 26 May 2018 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Bulgarian people Category:Artists
title: Svetlin Rusev
